Tour de France Wine Gift Set
List.Description:
This gift set also available with six bottles

Take a tour of France's three most famous wine regions: Bordeaux, Burgundy and the Rhone. Each wine is chosen to display the unique characteristics of the region it represents: bold Bordeaux from Château Les Graves de Barrau, silky Bouchard Burgundy from the birthplace of Pinot Noir and a spicy Grenache and Syrah blend from Louis Bernard in the Cotes-du-Rhone. Passport not required.

Wine Gift Set Includes:

  • Bordeaux: Château Les Graves de Barrau
    Displaying dark ruby colors, with aromas of blackcurrant, cherry and just a hint of vanilla, this wine is medium-bodied with dark berry flavors, well-balanced tannins and a long, smooth finish.

  • Burgundy: Bouchard Bourgogne Pinot Noir
    This Burgundy displays red fruit aromas, cherry, kirsch with notes of lime and mint. A plump wine with a lot of fruit and a delicate note of wood. With good persistence, it is harmonious and well balanced.

  • Rhône Valley: Louis Bernard Côtes-du-Rhône
    Cherry red color with concentrated berries and cherries on the nose, this wine has ample fruit, with a gentle hint of oak. An excellent match for barbeque.

  • Printed Insert that describes the featured wines

    Jean-Charles Boisset
    President, Boisset-America
    Discussing his family's wines included in our Tour de France Gift Pack:

    Due to the popularity of this gift, wines or vintages sometimes sell out. Should this happen, we will always substitute with the current vintage and wines with equal or greater value.

List.Name: Domaines Baron Rothschild Reserve Speciale Bordeaux Rouge 2010
Wine Aerator and Decanter Set
List.Description:
Wine that's been allowed to breathe tastes better. As wine breathes, it opens up, and releases its intended aromas and flavors. This unique three-phase aeration set makes the perfect gift for any wine lover or connoisseur. It provides instant and maximum aeration to an entire bottle of wine. Simply insert the aerator into the decanter, pour through the aerator, and serve!


This set works in three phases: The process begins when the wine is poured through the stainless-steel filter, catching sediment while disbursing into the aerator. The wine is then gently disbursed again, this time through holes in the aerator and into a specially designed globe, beginning the second aeration phase. The wine continues into the bottom of the aerator, travelling along the sides of the decanter, providing superior aeration and oxygenation. Finally, the wine comes to rest in the decanter, bursting with aroma and flavor. It also makes a beautiful serving piece!

Set Includes:

  • Double Wall Glass Wine Aerator
  • Blown Glass Decanter
  • Stainless-Steel Sediment Filter

    Wine not included.

Cupcakes & Wine Gift Set
List.Description:
The passion for cupcakes is here to stay with Stonewall Kitchen's wonderfully moist cupcakes and deliciously creamy frosting mix. Coupled with a bottle of Cupcake Chardonnay and you're set to have a good time!

Wine Gift Includes:

  • Cupcake Vineyards Chardonnay:
    This Chardonnay offers decadent levels of butter, cream, bright citrus and vanilla which melt into a balance of oak and subtle spice.

  • Stonewall Kitchen's Chocolate Coconut Cupcake and Frosting Mixes
  • Multi-Color Non-Pareils
  • 12 white candles
  • 12 paper liners

Due to the popularity of this gift, wines or vintages sometimes sell out. Should this happen, we will always substitute with the current vintage and wines with equal or greater value.

Wine gift sets & baskets may be packaged with the bottles separately boxed for their protection during shipment.

Pursuant to state laws in New York, gifts that contain both food and wine will be sent in two separate packages.

Fine Wine & Cheese Wine Gift Basket
List.Description:
This basket also available with Kendall Jackson 90 point Grand Reserve Chardonnay

We've paired this vibrant California Chardonnay with a collection of great treats: parmesan peppercorn cheese, crisp crackers, French country olives, and spicy cocktail almonds. A simple gift that is sure to please.

Wine Gift Basket Includes:

  • Raymond R Collection Chardonnay:
    A beautifully crisp Chardonnay, the R Collection opens with notes of fragrant floral perfume and ripe tropical fruit, with juicy peaches and dried apricots mingling on the palate.

  • Woven basket
  • Sonoma Jacks Parmesan Peppercorn Cheese 4 oz
  • Three Pepper Water Crackers 4 oz
  • French Country Olive Mix 4.4 oz
  • Nunes Farms Spicy Cocktail Almonds 1.5 oz

Due to the popularity of this gift, wines or vintages sometimes sell out. Should this happen, we will always substitute with the current vintage and wines with equal or greater value.

Franciscan and Saint Alicia Cabernet 6 pack
List.Description:
What do you get when you take two of our most popular Cabernets and package them together in a 6-pack? One amazing value! In the Ultimate Value Cabernet Duo, you’ll enjoy three bottles each of the Santa Alicia 2010 Cabernet and the Franciscan 2010 Cabernet.

Wine Gift Includes:

  • Santa Alicia Cabernet Sauvignon Maipo Reserva 2010
    A brilliant and deep ruby red color. Aromas of ripe fruit, bitter chocolate and spices. This wine also has good structure and concentration with round tannins.
    Rated 91 Points Wine & Spirits

  • Franciscan Cabernet Sauvignon 2010
    Rich, round, and full-bodied; layered with blackberry, cherry, dried plums, and a hint of cocoa; generous weight on the palate and smooth, mouth-filling tannins; the finish lingers with flavors of rich cassis and black cherry.
